items_types_nlp.prompt: What types of items do you produce or manage?
items_types_nlp.helper: List the categories of products, materials, or assets you work with.
items_types_nlp.placeholder: We make jeans, jackets, t-shirts, and other denim apparel. We also manage raw fabric, zippers, buttons, and other components...

items_sku_builder.prompt: Let's define what makes up your items
items_sku_builder.subtitle: Build your item structure
items_sku_builder.helper: Start with the basics (name, code, quantity) and add custom attributes that matter to you.

items_complexity.prompt: Do your items have components or sub-parts?
items_complexity.helper: For example, a jacket might have fabric, zippers, buttons, and thread as components.

items_components_builder.helper: For each component type, specify its attributes.

items_tracking_level.helper: Choose the level of granularity for your tracking.

options.label: Per unit
options.description: Each item has a unique ID (serial number)

options.label: Per batch
options.description: Groups of items tracked together (lot numbers)

options.label: Per order
options.description: Track by order only (no individual IDs)
